description: Applies a repository policy to the specified public repository to control access permissions. For more information, see Amazon ECR Repository Policies in the Amazon Elastic Container Registry User Guide.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The name of the repository to receive the policy.

parameters.name: policyText
parameters.description: The JSON repository policy text to apply to the repository. For more information, see Amazon ECR Repository Policies in the Amazon Elastic Container Registry User Guide.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The registry ID that's associated with the request.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The repository name that's associated with the request.

nested_items.name: policyText
nested_items.description: The JSON repository policy text that's applied to the repository.
